Articles.Content:
How do you do this?

People talk about this and so on but I never get it to work.

What do you mean?

Do you mean using RCS when in staging mode (as opposed to the docking mode I've never actually used)? If that's what you mean then just turn RCS on (default: R) and use I, J, K and L to translate up, left, down and right (relative to chase cam).
